changesets.comments: cgame: fix bounce effect(s) for dynamite, smoke bomb & nades refs #1007

cgame: don't convert direction of travel into axis for several weapons -
reverted to vanilla behaviour refs #1007

FIXME: check edv weapon cam

details.name: description
details.old_value:
Dynamite thrown on ground by engineers has a really weird bounce effect.

I bisected the issue to this commit "abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907":https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907, introduced in #950.
details.new_value:
Dynamite thrown on ground by engineers has a really weird bounce effect.

I bisected the issue to this commit "abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907":https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907, introduced in #950.

Issue is likely to affect WP_SMOKE_MARKER and WP_SMOKE_BOMB too.

subject: Throwing dyna on ground has weird bounce effect
description:
Dynamite thrown on ground by engineers has a really weird bounce effect.

I bisected the issue to this commit "abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907":https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/commit/abe3943aae0864998ffd12e6dea97f007062a907, introduced in #950.

Issue is likely to affect WP_SMOKE_MARKER and WP_SMOKE_BOMB too.
